description: Creates an empty Git-based source repository in a specified project. The repository is created with an initial empty commit with a default branch named main.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the project in the space.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the source repository. For more information about name requirements, see Quotas for source repositories.

nested_items.name: projectName
nested_items.description: The name of the project in the space.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the source repository.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the source repository.
